page.title: 15MEDIA IN PANTON
page.content: At {PANTON,}we are all able to tune in to Radio l,2,3 and 4 and have fairly good reception through all wave lengths. We have the benefit of BBC local radion stations, the nearest three being Radio Lincolnshire, Radio Humberside and Radio Nottingham. The television service includes BBC l, BBC 2, ITV (Yorkshire Television) and ITV Channel 4. Reception is excellent and we have a local landmark in the television transmitter mast at Belmont which is five miles away. Newspapers have to be collected from Wragby or Barkwith and local news is gathered from the "Market Rasen Mail", "Horncastle News" and the "Lincoln Standard" Other local news is gathered in the monthly "Wraggoe News" collated by the vicar of Wragby or "The Challenge collated by the vicar of East Barkwith.
